pr_title: [Metadata] Move version and mta id to annotations

timeline.message:
[Metadata] Store mta version in annotations instead of labels

LMCROSSITXSADEPLOY-1964

[Metadata] Encoded mta id in labels, decoded in annotations

LMCROSSITXSADEPLOY-1964

[Metadata] Validation for mta id and version in annotations

LMCROSSITXSADEPLOY-1964

[Metadata] Unit tests for mta version in annotations and encoded mta id

LMCROSSITXSADEPLOY-1964

timeline.bodyText: How do we guarantee hash size?
timeline.author: enchobelezirev

replies.bodyText: Guaranteed by the hashing algorithm itself. MD5 = 128 bits = 16 bytes = 32 hex digits
replies.author: valentinEmpy
